channel.title: Lock please! released!
channel.description:
I just recently got hold of a 554 deob server and started working on it. It isn't too hard to code it, but it does require knowledge of java.. So, lets start.
What I did:
runEnergy packet, handles degrading energy when running GE Packet, just a basic interface thing Changed some important text Fixed up tab switching, can now successfully go to inventory, attack tab, magic tab, music tab, friends/ignore tab, etc...
Some more crap I can't remember
What I plan to do in the future: Fix up talking Resting Player/Npc combat Add more packets, being more organized, etc... Fix noclip
As you can see I didn't do much, but it's a start.
Here's a short GIF of tab switching :D [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/orl1z5.gif[/img]

item.title: Lock please! released!
item.dc:creator: @karl1 karl`
item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

[quote=“pk3r john, post:3, topic:299039”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=395393.msg2937554#msg2937554 date=1251651126]
I’m just saying - If you want those graphics and gameframe, just go play RuneScape.
[/quote]

I’m doing this mainly because it uses more real java then just “case 445: //portal 1”. I learn a lot more from higher deobs for some reason.[/quote]
same, anyway nice work

Read full topic

item.title: Lock please! released!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

[quote=“ttaf5”]I think you should add full pvp drops and too catch the 536-544 deob get a working PvPBH with correct interfaces, Ancient Drops, and targets.
But what you’ve got now is very very good.

I’m doing this mainly because it uses more real java then just “case 445: //portal 1”. I learn a lot more from higher deobs for some reason.

I think Higher Deobs are mainly used for educational purposes not for hosted. too learn about this kind of coding at ages 11-19 is AMAZING. and besides MoparScape is going to be gone soon, FaGeX will eventaully find some gay thing too shut us down, so as they update its important we get on it as fast as possible too keep the community alive and too make shure that that whole-some game gets cracked!

Rep 4 u, Gj
Seeing that lot’s of people play RuneScape, and play this is kinda weird[/quote]

Thanks.

I’m working on prayers, should be done by tomorrow.

Read full topic

Rep 4 u, Gj
Seeing that lot’s of people play RuneScape, and play this is kinda weird

@pk3r_john wrote:

I just recently got hold of a 554 deob server and started working on it. It isn’t too hard to code it, but it does require knowledge of java…
So, lets start.

What I did:

runEnergy packet, handles degrading energy when running
GE Packet, just a basic interface thing
Changed some important text
Fixed up tab switching, can now successfully go to inventory, attack tab, magic tab, music tab, friends/ignore tab, etc…

What I plan to do in the future:
Fix up talking

Player/Npc combat
Add more packets, being more organized, etc…
Fix noclip

As you can see I didn’t do much, but it’s a start.
